It establishes a shared contract that all formatter classes must follow, ensuring consistency, predictability, and interoperability across different formatting modules.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"fa41709f-8fe4-43ce-a2ae-e01ed6286f8f","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"This file does not implement concrete formatting logic. Instead, it provides a minimal and explicit interface that guides how formatter subclasses should be designed.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"7fbd457e-34be-4df0-bdb3-300acc9dabfe","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"19f0f8ff-54bf-42a6-9acf-aff135613b0a","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":2,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Purpose","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"9e94d888-1c1b-4829-8b8e-4572734f8737","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The primary purpose of the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"base","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" file is to enforce a common structure for all formatters. By defining an abstract base class with a required method, it ensures that every formatter exposes a uniform entry point for generating formatted output.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"2111c13d-54e4-4ffa-840b-b2a6c68accf8","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Key goals include:","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"b08e658d-43d1-4f1e-9533-89eb5b4e46b1","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Enforcing a consistent formatter interface","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"0eb4189c-a496-4593-963e-f29925aa1837","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Promoting clear separation between formatting logic and data generation","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"63249fd5-89d7-4de0-9daa-01ba0e7522b9","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Simplifying integration of new formatter types","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"156b0289-f01f-4928-952c-7c2e95a1dda5","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"9d64a5eb-29d7-4a84-b450-6d7db8ef6ace","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":2,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Design Overview","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"ea1235a1-b7de-44a9-abce-0da77ae846b0","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"At the core of the file is the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"BaseFormatter","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" class, which acts as an abstract base class. It defines a single method, ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"generate","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", that must be implemented by all subclasses.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"e486e4c5-a5b8-471e-aca9-d456c3871bce","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The base implementation of ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"generate","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" raises a ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"NotImplementedError","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", making it explicit that:","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"3f21812c-15b8-4501-a857-a28ee186863b","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The method is required","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"d92e0f77-6fe3-4c33-900e-a93bf7b35c20","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Concrete subclasses are responsible for providing actual behavior","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"036c073f-f06a-4984-a0ba-855faf7891d5","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"This design encourages correctness by preventing incomplete formatter implementations from being used unintentionally.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"1cdc877e-15fb-4273-b8fa-2a8dd58fa8b1","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"2da641db-d146-485f-b19e-100c09f630ce","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":2,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Typical Usage","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"6b393137-fb8d-49f4-9622-52ff39eabc1e","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"base","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" file is not intended to be used directly. Instead, other formatter classes inherit from ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"BaseFormatter","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and implement the required ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"generate","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" method.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"f7e68c8e-2acd-4ac6-851e-700e7b767a30","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Example:","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"2fd7ce7b-0a52-414f-8c67-2fc6c786caf8","type":"codeBlock","props":{"language":"python"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"class CustomFormatter(BaseFormatter):\n    def generate(self):\n        return {\"example\": \"formatted output\"}","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"397dc12f-f713-4146-a1d1-57419df9102c","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"This guarantees that all formatter instances can be interacted with in a consistent way, regardless of their internal logic.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"32d03aba-3197-4bee-858c-69023b062a5c","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"e0937beb-576d-4f5c-a299-dd25b86bd96f","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":2,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Role in the Formatter Architecture","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"f07aa7d0-6001-44dd-8faf-2e5e24319da4","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Within the broader formatter architecture, the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"base","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" file acts as the contract layer. It decouples formatter consumers from specific implementations, allowing different formatters to be swapped or extended without changing how they are invoked.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"a1bf4e5d-bfe2-4f4a-b2ca-b53ce24ec33c","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"2890bd06-5f8c-4eda-9483-3bb320a4a39b","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":2,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Summary","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"0021eeed-c369-4412-9d3d-22bac345ddf2","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"In summary, the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"base","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" file provides the structural foundation for all formatter implementations. By defining a strict and minimal interface, it ensures consistency, extensibility, and reliability across the formatting layer of the Jarvis project.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"1153e207-1892-4f1f-adc9-58e060cb054a","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[],"children":[]}]
